verses.verse: O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for he is good: <S%H2896><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endures for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> that his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endures for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
Let the house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> that his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endures for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
Let them now <S%H4994><s%> that fear <S%H3373><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> that his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endures for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
I called <S%H7121><s%> on the LORD <S%H3050><s%> in distress: <S%H4712><s%> the LORD <S%H3050><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> me, and set me in a large <S%H4800><s%> place.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is on my side; I will not fear: <S%H3372><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> can man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to me?
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> takes my part with them that help <S%H5826><s%> me: therefore shall I see <S%H7200><s%> my desire on them that hate <S%H8130><s%> me.
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to trust <S%H2620><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> than to put confidence <S%H982><s%> in man. <S%H120><s%>
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to trust <S%H2620><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> than to put confidence <S%H982><s%> in princes. <S%H5081><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> compassed <S%H5437><s%> me about: but in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will I destroy <S%H4135><s%> them.
They compassed <S%H5437><s%> me about; yes, <S%H1571><s%> they compassed <S%H5437><s%> me about: but in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> I will destroy <S%H4135><s%> them.

They compassed <S%H5437><s%> me about like bees: <S%H1682><s%> they are quenched <S%H1846><s%> as the fire <S%H784><s%> of thorns: <S%H6975><s%> for in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> I will destroy <S%H4135><s%> them.
You have thrust <S%H1760><s%> sore at me that I might fall: <S%H5307><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> helped <S%H5826><s%> me.
The LORD <S%H3050><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song, <S%H2176><s%> and is become <S%H1961><s%> my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of rejoicing <S%H7440><s%> and salvation <S%H3444><s%> is in the tabernacles <S%H168><s%> of the righteous: <S%H6662><s%> the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> valiantly. <S%H2428><s%>

The right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is exalted: <S%H7426><s%> the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> valiantly. <S%H2428><s%>
I shall not die, <S%H4191><s%> but live, <S%H2421><s%> and declare <S%H5608><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>
The LORD <S%H3050><s%> has chastened <S%H3256><s%> me sore: but he has not given <S%H5414><s%> me over <S%H5414><s%> to death. <S%H4194><s%>
Open <S%H6605><s%> to me the gates <S%H8179><s%> of righteousness: <S%H6664><s%> I will go <S%H935><s%> into them, and I will praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD: <S%H3050><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> into which the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall enter. <S%H935><s%>
I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you: for you have heard <S%H6030><s%> me, and are become <S%H1961><s%> my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
The stone <S%H68><s%> which the builders <S%H1129><s%> refused <S%H3988><s%> is become <S%H1961><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> stone of the corner. <S%H6438><s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> is the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> doing; <S%H1961><s%> it is marvelous <S%H6381><s%> in our eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> is the day <S%H3117><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has made; <S%H6213><s%> we will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> and be glad <S%H8056><s%> in it.
Save <S%H3467><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> I beseech <S%H577><s%> you, O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I beseech <S%H577><s%> you, send now <S%H4994><s%> prosperity. <S%H6743><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be he that comes <S%H935><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> we have blessed <S%H1288><s%> you out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

God <S%H410><s%> is the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which has showed us light: <S%H216><s%> bind <S%H631><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2282><s%> with cords, <S%H5688><s%> even to the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>
You are my God, <S%H410><s%> and I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you: you are my God, <S%H430><s%> I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> you.
O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for he is good: <S%H2896><s%> for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endures for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
